import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Grid, Image, List, Divider, Segment, Url, Header, Rating, Button, Icon } from 'semantic-ui-react' import ReactPlayer from 'react-player' const _SearchMovieListDisplay = (props) => { return (
{props.movie.original_title || props.movie.name}
Rating: {props.movie.vote_average * 10}%{" "} {props.movie.overview} ) } export default _SearchMovieListDisplay;
